document_data.name: Vicala Szind
document_data.mainbody: cala could call on a number of powerful [[divine spell]]s from her mistress, including ''[[symbol of pain]]'', ''[[cometfall]]'', ''[[unholy blight]]'', and ''[[flame strike]]''.
document_data.Description: In drow tradition, Vicala wore an elaborate outfit that bared much of her skin and had many sharp angles.
document_data.Abilities: Vicala could call on a number of powerful [[divine spell]]s from her mistress, including ''[[symbol of pain]]'', ''[[cometfall]]'', ''[[unholy blight]]'', and ''[[flame strike]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Vicala's ''[[sacrificial dagger]]'' was a powerful blade soaked in the blood of many innocents.
